sub_title: Policy research || International cooperation || Public affairs
summary: As a professional in democratic sustainable development, I believe in sound research and cross-sectoral debate between government, civil society and science to create a sustainable world. My aim is to create more effective (political) partnerships in order to improve democratic cooperation, create sustainable food systems and realize a nature-inclusive global economy. I realize this by convincing political and social actors to bridge differences, take up an inquisitive mindset and a socially inclusive attitude.
